prompts: Create a colorful bird Pokemon that uses psychic powers to control its surroundings.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a green bird with a unique outfit and mystical abilities.
Generate an elegant flying-type Pokemon with vibrant colors and a mysterious aura.
Make a Pokemon that can see into the future, featuring bright green and red colors.
Imagine a bird-like Pokemon with elegant feathers and a calm demeanor, perfect for a forest.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the mountains, combining beauty and wisdom.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon with psychic abilities and a vibrant, eye-catching design.
